function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential fog-cloud combined IoT network for COVID-19 prevention and control","Impact":"Failure to prevent or control the spread of COVID-19 and other contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Regular maintenance and updating of the IoT network, real-time data analysis, and prompt response to identified outbreaks","Technologies":"IoT, fog computing, cloud computing, AI","People":"General public, healthcare workers, patients, and at-risk populations","Owner":"Public health authorities, healthcare organizations, and technology providers"},{"Description":"Deployment of AI to diagnose COVID-19 symptoms and pneumonia","Impact":"Inaccurate diagnosis leading to delayed treatment or mismanagement of the disease","Mitigation":"Validation of AI algorithms with clinical data, continuous improvement based on real-world feedback, and integration with medical professionals","Technologies":"AI, medical imaging, data analysis","People":"Patients, healthcare providers, and medical researchers","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, medical research institutions, and technology developers"},{"Description":"Use of mobile remote presence systems for medical consultations","Impact":"Inadequate patient care and diagnosis due to limitations of remote consultations","Mitigation":"Training for healthcare professionals in conducting effective remote consultations, development of guidelines for when remote consultations are appropriate, and continuous monitoring of patient outcomes","Technologies":"IoT, robotics, telepresence systems","People":"Healthcare providers and patients","Owner":"Healthcare institutions and technology providers"}]}
